Shason Textile presents the PVC Coated Faux Leather vinyl fabric, 52/54” Wide. The weight of the fabric is 400gsm. Like real leather, faux leathers are soft to touch. It has many desirable attributes of genuine leather. Perfect for beginner and advanced craft makers.

• Shason presents High Quality Coral Fleece Fabric. Our fleece fabrics are made of premium-grade materials. This fabric is carefully designed and materials were hand-picked by the Shason Team. Having the luxurious and soft feel of the fabric, it gives class to the whole project.
